name: pdf-lib

scripts.apps:rn:android: yarn apps:rn:emulator & cd apps/rn && yarn add ./../.. --force && react-native run-android
scripts.apps:rn:emulator: emulator -avd "$(emulator -list-avds | head -n 1)" & bash -c 'sleep 5 && adb reverse tcp:8080 tcp:8080 && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081'
scripts.apps:rn:ios: cd apps/rn && yarn add ./../.. --force && react-native run-ios
scripts.build: yarn build:cjs && yarn build:es && yarn build:umd && yarn build:umd:min && yarn build:downlevel-dts
scripts.build:downlevel-dts: rimraf ts3.4 && yarn downlevel-dts . ts3.4 && rimraf ts3.4/scratchpad
scripts.clean: rimraf ts3.4 build cjs dist es scratchpad/build coverage tsBuildInfo.json isolate*.log flamegraph.html out.pdf
scripts.lint: yarn lint:prettier && yarn lint:tslint:src && yarn lint:tslint:tests
scripts.release:latest: yarn publish --tag latest && yarn pack && yarn release:tag
scripts.release:prep: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn typecheck && yarn test && yarn build
scripts.release:tag: TAG="v$(yarn --silent get:version)" && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
scripts.scratchpad:flame: rimraf isolate*.log && node --prof scratchpad/build/scratchpad/index.js && node --prof-process --preprocess -j isolate*.log | flamebearer
